payload.content: The coming era will feature highly bespoke software.

name: The coming era will feature highly bespoke software.
content: The coming era will feature highly bespoke software.

payload.content: A custom dashboard for tracking a specific cardio experiment was created in about an hour using an LLM agent, which involved reverse engineering a treadmill API, processing data, and creating a web UI.

name: A custom dashboard for tracking a specific cardio experiment was created in abou
content: A custom dashboard for tracking a specific cardio experiment was created in about an hour using an LLM agent, which involved reverse engineering a treadmill API, processing data, and creating a web UI.

payload.content: There will never be a specific app on an app store for highly niche, bespoke needs like a 'Cardio experiment tracker' because LLM agents can generate such applications on the fly with minimal code.

name: There will never be a specific app on an app store for highly niche, bespoke nee
content: There will never be a specific app on an app store for highly niche, bespoke needs like a 'Cardio experiment tracker' because LLM agents can generate such applications on the fly with minimal code.

payload.content: The concept of an 'app store' with a long tail of discrete applications is becoming outdated as LLM agents can improvise and generate custom applications instantly.

name: The concept of an 'app store' with a long tail of discrete applications is becom
content: The concept of an 'app store' with a long tail of discrete applications is becoming outdated as LLM agents can improvise and generate custom applications instantly.
